metadata.title: CVE-2013-7299 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
framework/common/messageheaderparser.cpp in Tntnet before 2.2.1 allowsremote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a header that ends in\n instead of \r\n, which prevents a null terminator from being added andcauses Tntnet to include headers from other requests.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7299` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtntnet12 - 2.2.1-1
tntnet - 2.2.1-1
tntnet-demos - 2.2.1-1
tntnet-runtime - 2.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tntnet package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-1').
